Finding yourself at the end of the assembly line, you see that a dozen finished dolls are lined up in front of a large machine. Thick cables hang down from this machine at regular intervals, and are each plugged into a doll via a port on the back of their neck.

[saellatrix.speech(This machine has been charged with the unique enchantment which my mother, the elder lilin Lovienne, created,)] Saellatrix proudly boasts, [saellatrix.speech(By the time it's finished, these inanimate toys will be fully autonomous sex dolls, just like that bitch there.)]

Looking over to one side of the machine, you see a sex doll standing at attention beside a control panel. It looks like she's monitoring and refining the enchantment process, for every few seconds or so she adjusts a dial or moves a lever.

[saellatrix.speech(There's nowhere else in the realm which produces such high quality sex dolls,)] Saellatrix says in her posh British accent, [saellatrix.speech(The toys you see here will soon be making their new owners very happy indeed. Now, shall we move on?)]

Past the end of the assembly line, you find yourself in the area that's used for storing finished dolls. Several dozen of the black silicone toys have been lines up here in neat rows, waiting to be taken up to the shop once space is available for them.

[saellatrix.speech(Impressive, don't you think?)] Saellatrix gloats, [saellatrix.speech(Our factory is able to finish a dozen dolls a day.)]

#IF(pc.hasPerkAnywhereInTree(PERK_OBSERVANT)) Although at first glance these dolls look good enough, you notice that there are very faint, yet visible, gaps between their limbs and torsos. What's more, they're lacking the fine details of the dolls on display in the shop... #ELSE You've already seen enough dolls in the shop upstairs, and so there's not much here to interest you. Turning away, you prepare to head elsewhere in the factory... #ENDIF

Needing to know why there's a difference between these dolls and the ones in the shop, you ask Saellatrix why there are visible gaps between their limbs and torsos.

[saellatrix.speech(What? Don't be silly, you're imagining things,)] the succubus snaps, before impatiently tapping her foot and saying, [saellatrix.speech(You're running out of time on your tour, so we need to move on to somewhere else. No more inspecting the dolls!)]

It doesn't seem like you're going to get anywhere by pressing the point, so you turn away from the suspicious-looking dolls and wonder where to go next...

As you return to the door through which you entered the factory, Saellatrix states, [saellatrix.speech(You still have some time left, but if you've seen enough then we can end this tour right now.)]

Waiting expectantly to hear your reply, the succubus taps her foot and lets out an impatient sigh.

Not yet wanting to end the tour of the factory, you tell Saellatrix that you'd like to continue.

[saellatrix.speech(Then why did you return here?)] she pointedly asks. Not waiting for a reply, she turns and starts to walk back into the main area of the factory, calling back to you as she goes, [saellatrix.speech(Come on then, you don't have much time left.)]

Having seen enough, you tell Saellatrix that you'd like to end the tour. Clearly impatient to be getting back to the shop floor, the succubus quickly steps past you, and you can't help but glance down at her sizeable rear end as her strutting gait causes it to hypnotically sway from side to side.

[saellatrix.speech(If you see one of those wretched journalists, then you can tell them that there's nothing suspicious going on in here,)] Saellatrix says as she comes to a halt beside the door and turns to face you. Allowing her spaded tail to flick up and scratch an itch on one of her thick thighs, she sighs, [saellatrix.speech(Although the outrageous rumours about us transforming people into sex dolls have been quelled, those vultures from The Octogram Herald won't stop harassing me. Now that you've seen how we make the dolls, you'll be able to tell those hacks the truth if you see them.)]

Only after you've made a non-committal response does Saellatrix open the door, before leading you back to the counter and saying, [saellatrix.speech(If you'd like another tour of the factory then just let me know. Not today, though. Anyway, would you like to buy something? A doll, perhaps?)]

The door in front of you isn't locked, but as you turn the handle and peer into the corridor beyond, you suddenly freeze in your tracks. Although it's faint, you can hear the solitary security guard moving around somewhere within the shop floor.

[fia.speech(I told you he spends all night fucking that demo doll...)] Fia whispers from behind you. Sure enough, as you listen more closely, you realise that what you're hearing is faint grunts and wet smacking sounds.

[fia.speech(There's nothing this way but that fake factory and the shop floor,)] Fia quietly says, before tugging on your [pc.arm(true)] and saying, [fia.speech(Come on, let's go back the other way...)]

[fia.speech(Woah, look at this place,)] Fia mutters as the two of you enter the store's staff room. #IF(pc.getTotalTimesHadSex(saellatrix)>0) Having already been shown this room by Saellatrix herself, your surroundings come as no surprise to you, but it's still impressive to see what the succubus has done with the place. #ENDIF

Unlike the basic sort of facilities found in most rooms of this type, the space before you has the appearance of a very upmarket bar. The beam from Fia's flashlight passes over several black designer sofas, before reflecting off a trio of expensive-looking chandeliers and then wandering over the polished marble floor to illuminate a fully-stocked bar on the far side of the room. Standing behind this bar are two golden sex dolls, but thankfully neither of them react to your sudden appearance, and remain completely and utterly motionless.

[fia.speech(That's kind of creepy,)] Fia mutters, [fia.speech(Come on, there's nothing for us in here, let's keep moving...)]
Not wanting to bump into the security guard, and with nothing to be gained from going through the door, you turn around and head back into the staff room...

Thanks to the access card which Fia obtained from her friend, the two of you have been able to gain access to Lovienne's Luxuries. Standing beside the door via which you've entered the property, the two of you now have but one way to go in order to find the evidence you need to prove that Saellatrix and Angelixx are dealing in illegal slaves...

A pair of doors on either side of the staff room's bar lead into a short, undecorated corridor. In stark contrast to the luxurious room which its connected to, this corridor has a concrete floor, bare brick walls, and a maze of pipes running along the ceiling.

[fia.speech(That looks promising,)] Fia says as she points her flashlight towards an industrial elevator located at the far end of the corridor. Looking over at you, she guesses, [fia.speech(I bet that'll take us down to some offices, or even the real factory where Sae has her sex dolls made. I'm sure there'll be evidence of where those illegal slaves are down there...)]

A large, industrial elevator is positioned at the end of the corridor. As you and Fia approach, the doors slide open, bathing your surroundings in a cold, sterile light.

[fia.speech(Come on, [pc.name],)] your companion says, [fia.speech(We need to find out what's down there...)]

Stepping forwards, Fia eagerly motions for you to follow her...
